title: Den11

content: Guys who can help find a free cryptocurrency exchange script. Give links please.Maybe someone knows there is something similar to xeggex, exbitron.

comments.author: codehtcmail
comments.body: Quote from: Den11 on June 14, 2023, 11:02:54 AMGuys who can help find a free cryptocurrency exchange script. Give links please.Maybe someone knows there is something similar to xeggex, exbitron.Why don't you use exchange bots like the one on Bybit ?

Give links please.Maybe someone knows there is something similar to xeggex, exbitron.Why don't you use exchange bots like the one on Bybit ?You misunderstood me. comments.author: codehtcmail
comments.body: Quote from: Den11 on June 15, 2023, 05:52:41 AMQuote from: codehtcmail on June 15, 2023, 05:31:37 AMQuote from: Den11 on June 14, 2023, 11:02:54 AMGuys who can help find a free cryptocurrency exchange script. Give links please.Maybe someone knows there is something similar to xeggex, exbitron.Why don't you use exchange bots like the one on Bybit ?You misunderstood me. I'm looking for a script of the exchange itself, a clone.Ok, so you want to start an exchange using a free script ? I don't think such free script exists and if you find one it is most likely full of hidden backdoors to steal crypto from you and your potential users.
